summary: Completed comprehensive testing of unified shopping cart and password reset functionality. All major features working correctly including cart CRUD operations, mixed video/shop item checkout, and password reset flow.

minor_issues.issue: Admin user already registered from previous iterations
Console warnings about setState calls during render
minor_issues.impact: No functional impact - development warnings only

passed_tests: Backend cart CRUD operations (100% success rate)
Video and shop item purchase flows
Cart page loads for logged-in users
Add video to cart from video detail page
Add shop item to cart from shop item detail page
Update shop item quantity in cart
Cart checkout with shipping for physical items
Forgot password page renders and form submits successfully
Cart icon shows in navbar with accurate item count
Login page has forgot password link
Shipping form appears for physical items
